item.name: ID&V and Screening Diving Licence Firewall Rules

body.raw:
{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
          [rule
           :document-driving-licence
           [let [ic [identity-check! enduser]
                 ic-status [get ic :status]]
            [if [= ic-status \"ok\"]
             [let [ca [screening enduser]
                   hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
              [if [> hits 0]
               quarantine
               ok]]
             [let [dc [document-check-driving-licence! enduser]
                   dc-status [get dc :status]]
              [if [= dc-status \"ok\"]
               [let [ca [screening enduser]
                     hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
                [if [> hits 0]
                 quarantine
                 ok]]
               quarantine]]]]]]
        "
           }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
          [rule
           :document-driving-licence
           [let [ic [identity-check! enduser]
                 ic-status [get ic :status]]
            [if [= ic-status \"ok\"]
             [let [ca [screening enduser]
                   hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
              [if [> hits 0]
               quarantine
               ok]]
             [let [dc [document-check-driving-licence! enduser]
                   dc-status [get dc :status]]
              [if [= dc-status \"ok\"]
               [let [ca [screening enduser]
                     hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
                [if [> hits 0]
                 quarantine
                 ok]]
               quarantine]]]]]]
        "
           }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
          [rule
           :document-driving-licence
           [let [ic [identity-check! enduser]
                 ic-status [get ic :status]]
            [if [= ic-status \"ok\"]
             [let [ca [screening enduser]
                   hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
              [if [> hits 0]
               quarantine
               ok]]
             [let [dc [document-check-driving-licence! enduser]
                   dc-status [get dc :status]]
              [if [= dc-status \"ok\"]
               [let [ca [screening enduser]
                     hits [get ca \"total_hits\"]]
                [if [> hits 0]
                 quarantine
                 ok]]
               quarantine]]]]]]
        "
           }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": 
    " [rules 
      [rule 
      :identity-check
      [let [ic [identity-check! enduser] 
      status [get ic :status]] 
      [if [= status \"ok\"
      ] ok quarantine]]]]
      " 
}

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": 
    " [rules 
      [rule 
      :identity-check
      [let [ic [identity-check! holder] 
      status [get ic :status]] 
      [if [= status \"ok\"
      ] ok quarantine]]]]
      " 
}

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": 
    " [rules 
      [rule 
      :identity-check
      [let [ic [identity-check! sender] 
      status [get ic :status]] 
      [if [= status \"ok\"
      ] ok quarantine]]]]
      " 
}

item.name: Create a EUR Ledger for Enduser

body.raw:
{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
          [rule
           :document-driving-licence
           [let [ic [identity-check! beneficiary]
                 ic-status [get ic :status]]
            [if [= ic-status \"ok\"
            ]
             [let [ca [screening beneficiary]
                   hits [get ca \"total_hits\"
                   ]]
              [if [> hits 0]
               quarantine
               ok]]
             [let [dc [document-check-driving-licence! beneficiary]
                   dc-status [get dc :status]]
              [if [= dc-status \"ok\"
              ]
               [let [ca [screening beneficiary]
                     hits [get ca \"total_hits\"
                     ]]
                [if [> hits 0]
                 quarantine
                 ok]]
               quarantine]]]]]]
        "
           }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
          [rule
           :passport
           [let [ic [identity-check! enduser]
                 ic-status [get ic :status]]
            [if [= ic-status \"ok\"
            ]
             ok
             [let [dc [document-check-passport! enduser]
                   dc-status [get dc :status]]
              [if [= dc-status \"ok\"
              ]
               ok
               quarantine]]]]]]
               "


                       }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
    [rule  :passport-check
      [let  [dc  [document-check-passport! enduser]
        status  [get  dc  :status]]
      [if  [=  status  \"ok\"
      ]        
      ok    
      quarantine]]]]"
                       }

item.name: ID&V to onboard an enduser (drivers licence)

body.raw:
{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
    [rule  :driving-licence-check
      [let  [dc  [document-check-driving-licence! enduser]
        status  [get  dc  :status]]
      [if  [=  status  \"ok\"
      ]        
      ok    
      quarantine]]]]"
                       }

{
  "compliance_firewall_rules": "
  [rules
    [rule  :identity-check
      [let  [ic  [identity-check!  enduser]
        status  [get  ic  :status]]
      [if  [=  status  \"ok\"
      ]        
      ok    
      quarantine]]]]"
                       }
